import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' import { SERVER_URL } from '../../../config/settings' import { ProfileImageContext, EditProfileModalContext, ImageCropModalContext } from '../../../context/edit-profile/EditProfileContext' export default function CroppieModal(props) { const [profileImage, setProfileImage] = useContext(ProfileImageContext) const [editProfileModalIsOpen, setEditProfileModalIsOpen] = useContext(EditProfileModalContext) const [imageCropModalIsOpen, setImageCropModalIsOpen] = useContext(ImageCropModalContext) const handleModalClose = () => { setImageCropModalIsOpen(false) setEditProfileModalIsOpen(true) } return ( Editar perfil
) }
